title: odam-data-package
description: Description of an ODAM data package

path.title: Path
path.description: A fully qualified URL, or a POSIX file path..
path.context: Implementations need to negotiate the type of path provided, and dereference the data accordingly.

name.title: Name
name.description: An identifier string. Lower case characters with `_` are allowed.
name.context: This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: A list of keywords that describe this package.

license.title: License

name.title: Open Definition license identifier
name.description: MUST be an Open Definition license identifier, see http://licenses.opendefinition.org/

license.context: Use of this property does not imply that the person was the original creator of, or a contributor to, the data in the descriptor, but refers to the composition of the descriptor itself.

licenses.title: Licenses
licenses.description: The license(s) under which this package is published.
licenses.context: This property is not legally binding and does not guarantee that the package is licensed under the terms defined herein.

tabularDataResources.title: Tabular Data Resources
tabularDataResources.description: An `array` of Tabular Data Resource objects, each compliant with the [Tabular Data Resource](/tabular-data-resource/) specification.
